dev.jeka.core.api.java

Class JkManifest<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.jeka.core.api.java.JkManifest<T>

  • public final class JkManifest<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to read and write Manifest from and to file.

    • Field Summary

        public JkManifest<T> merge(java.util.jar.Manifest other)
